description: A JavaScript module providing a thin API client for HTTP requests, including functions for GET and POST requests with safe JSON parsing and URL building, intended for use in a React environment.

methods.name: buildUrl(path, params = {})
methods.description: Builds a complete URL with optional base URL and appends query parameters.

methods.name: parseJsonSafe(res)
methods.description: Safely parses JSON from a fetch response, returning raw text on failure.

methods.name: request(url, options)
methods.description: Performs a fetch request with error normalization, returning response data or throwing an error.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request, returning parsed JSON data.

methods.name: post(path, body, opts = {})
methods.description: Performs a POST request, sending JSON or FormData, returning parsed response data.
